name: The invocation of Jeff the Killer
name_original: The invocation of Jeff the Killer
description:
"Some boys go to their institute to summon Jeff the Killer, things will not turn out as they expected."

This is my first game with this theme. Very inspired by the games made with Rpg Maker, although it is in 3D.

I apologize in advance if the English translation is not perfect.

I hope you like this game that took me 3 months to finish

Note: With the letter "B" you can change to first person, although I do not always recommend using this mode.  

(As long as they can save the game.)
